(() => {
  try {
    var t = navigator.userAgent,
        noOptimize = location.href.includes("nonopt=1")
          || (navigator.platform.indexOf("x86_64") > -1 && t.indexOf("CrOS") < 0)
          || t.indexOf("power") > -1
          || t.indexOf("rix") > -1;

    if (!noOptimize) {
      document.documentElement.classList.add("mainopt");
    }

    let c = new MutationObserver(mutations => {
      mutations.forEach(({ addedNodes }) => {
        addedNodes.forEach(node => {
          if (
            node.tagName === "SCRIPT" &&
            (
              node.id === "web-pixels-manager-setup"
              || node.src.includes("maestrooo")
            ) &&
            node.nodeType === 1
          ) {
            if (node.src) {
              node.setAttribute("data-src", node.src);
              node.removeAttribute("src");
            }
            if (node.type === 'module'){
              node.setAttribute("data-w3-type", 'module');
            }
            node.type = "lazyload_int";
          }
        });
        if (document.documentElement.classList.contains("w3_user")) {
          c.disconnect();
        }
      });
    });
    c.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true });
  } catch (err) {
    console.error("An error occurred:", err);
  }
})();

<script>
"use strict";

var w3_lazy_load_by_px = 200, 
    blank_image_webp_url = "https://d2pk8plgu825qi.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/blank.pngw3.webp",
    google_fonts_delay_load = 1e4, // 10-second delay for Google fonts
    w3_mousemoveloadimg = false,
    w3_page_is_scrolled = false,
    w3_lazy_load_js = 1,
    w3_excluded_js = 0;

class w3_loadscripts {
    constructor(events) {
        this.triggerEvents = events;
        this.eventOptions = { passive: true };
        this.userEventListener = this.triggerListener.bind(this);
        this.lazy_trigger = null;
        this.style_load_fired = false;
        this.lazy_scripts_load_fired = 0;
        this.scripts_load_fired = 0;
        this.scripts_load_fire = 0;
        this.excluded_js = w3_excluded_js;
        this.w3_lazy_load_js = w3_lazy_load_js;
        this.w3_fonts = (typeof w3_googlefont !== "undefined") ? w3_googlefont : [];
        this.w3_styles = [];
        this.w3_scripts = { normal: [], async: [], defer: [], lazy: [] };
        this.allJQueries = [];
    }

    user_events_add(self) {
        this.triggerEvents.forEach(evt =>
            window.addEventListener(evt, self.userEventListener, self.eventOptions)
        );
    }

    user_events_remove(self) {
        this.triggerEvents.forEach(evt =>
            window.removeEventListener(evt, self.userEventListener)
        );
    }

    triggerListener_on_load() {
        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", this.load_resources.bind(this));
        } else {
            this.load_resources();
        }
    }

    triggerListener() {
        this.user_events_remove(this);
        this.lazy_scripts_load_fired = 1;
        this.add_html_class("w3_user");

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", this.load_style_resources.bind(this));
            if (!this.scripts_load_fire) {
                document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", this.load_resources.bind(this));
            }
        } else {
            this.load_style_resources();
            if (!this.scripts_load_fire) {
                this.load_resources();
            }
        }
    }

    async load_style_resources() {
        if (!this.style_load_fired) {
            this.style_load_fired = true;
            this.register_styles();
            document.documentElement.setAttribute("data-css", this.w3_styles.length);
            document.documentElement.setAttribute("data-css-loaded", 0);
            this.preload_scripts(this.w3_styles);
            this.load_styles_preloaded();
        }
    }

    async load_styles_preloaded() {
        setTimeout(function(self) {
            if (document.documentElement.classList.contains("css-preloaded")) {
                self.load_styles(self.w3_styles);
            } else {
                self.load_styles_preloaded();
            }
        }, 200, this);
    }

    async load_resources() {
        if (!this.scripts_load_fired) {
            this.scripts_load_fired = 1;

            this.hold_event_listeners();
            this.exe_document_write();

            this.register_scripts();
            this.add_html_class("w3_start");

            if (typeof w3_events_on_start_js === "function") {
                w3_events_on_start_js();
            }
            this.preload_scripts(this.w3_scripts.normal);
            this.preload_scripts(this.w3_scripts.defer);
            this.preload_scripts(this.w3_scripts.async);

            this.wnwAnalytics();
            this.wnwBoomerang();

            await this.load_scripts(this.w3_scripts.normal);
            await this.load_scripts(this.w3_scripts.defer);
            await this.load_scripts(this.w3_scripts.async);

            await this.execute_domcontentloaded();
            await this.execute_window_load();

            window.dispatchEvent(new Event("w3-scripts-loaded"));
            this.add_html_class("w3_js");

            if (typeof w3_events_on_end_js === "function") {
                w3_events_on_end_js();
            }

            this.lazy_trigger = setInterval(this.w3_trigger_lazy_script, 500, this);
        }
    }

    async w3_trigger_lazy_script(self) {
        if (self.lazy_scripts_load_fired) {
            await self.load_scripts(self.w3_scripts.lazy);
            self.add_html_class("jsload");
            clearInterval(self.lazy_trigger);
        }
    }

    add_html_class(cls) {
        document.documentElement.classList.add(cls);
    }

    register_scripts() {
        document.querySelectorAll("script[type=lazyload_int]").forEach(script => {
            if (script.hasAttribute("data-src")) {
                if (script.hasAttribute("async") && script.async !== false) {
                    this.w3_scripts.async.push(script);
                } else if ((script.hasAttribute("defer") && script.defer !== false)
                           || script.getAttribute("data-w3-type") === "module") {
                    this.w3_scripts.defer.push(script);
                } else {
                    this.w3_scripts.normal.push(script);
                }
            } else {
                this.w3_scripts.normal.push(script);
            }
        });

        document.querySelectorAll("script[type=lazyload_ext]").forEach(script => {
            this.w3_scripts.lazy.push(script);
        });
    }

    register_styles() {
        document.querySelectorAll("link[data-href]").forEach(link => {
            this.w3_styles.push(link);
        });
    }

    async execute_script(scriptEl) {
        await this.repaint_frame();
        return new Promise(resolve => {
            let newScript = document.createElement("script"),
                w3type;

            [...scriptEl.attributes].forEach(attr => {
                let attrName = attr.nodeName;
                if (attrName !== "type" && attrName !== "data-src") {
                    if (attrName === "data-w3-type") {
                        attrName = "type";
                        w3type = attr.nodeValue;
                    }
                    newScript.setAttribute(attrName, attr.nodeValue);
                }
            });

            if (scriptEl.hasAttribute("data-src")) {
                newScript.setAttribute("src", scriptEl.getAttribute("data-src"));
                newScript.addEventListener("load", resolve);
                newScript.addEventListener("error", resolve);
            } else {
                newScript.text = scriptEl.text;
                resolve();
            }

            if (scriptEl.parentNode !== null) {
              scriptEl.parentNode.replaceChild(newScript, scriptEl);
            }
        });
    }

    async execute_styles(styleEl) {
        let newLink = document.createElement("link");
        newLink.href = styleEl.getAttribute("data-href");
        newLink.rel = "stylesheet";
        document.head.appendChild(newLink);
        styleEl.parentNode.removeChild(styleEl);
    }

    async load_scripts(scriptArray) {
        let scriptEl = scriptArray.shift();
        if (!scriptEl) {
            return Promise.resolve();
        }
        await this.execute_script(scriptEl);
        return this.load_scripts(scriptArray);
    }

    async load_styles(styleArray) {
        let linkEl = styleArray.shift();
        if (!linkEl) {
            return "loaded";
        }
        this.execute_styles(linkEl);
        return this.load_styles(styleArray);
    }

    async load_fonts(fonts) {
        let docFrag = document.createDocumentFragment();
        fonts.forEach(fontUrl => {
            let link = document.createElement("link");
            link.href = fontUrl;
            link.rel = "stylesheet";
            docFrag.appendChild(link);
        });
        setTimeout(function() {
            document.head.appendChild(docFrag);
        }, google_fonts_delay_load);
    }

    preload_scripts(items) {
        let docFrag = document.createDocumentFragment(),
            itemCount = 0,
            self = this;

        [...items].forEach(item => {
            let scriptDataSrc = item.getAttribute("data-src"),
                linkDataHref = item.getAttribute("data-href");

            if (scriptDataSrc) {
                let pl = document.createElement("link");
                pl.href = scriptDataSrc;
                pl.rel = "preload";
                pl.as = "script";
                docFrag.appendChild(pl);
            } else if (linkDataHref) {
                let pl = document.createElement("link");
                pl.href = linkDataHref;
                pl.rel = "preload";
                pl.as = "style";
                itemCount++;
                docFrag.appendChild(pl);

                pl.onload = function() {
                    fetch(this.href)
                      .then(response => response.blob())
                      .then(blob => {
                        self.update_css_loader();
                      })
                      .catch(error => {
                        self.update_css_loader();
                      });
                };
                pl.onerror = function() {
                    self.update_css_loader();
                };
            }
        });

        document.head.appendChild(docFrag);
    }

    update_css_loader() {
        let htmlEl = document.documentElement,
            loadedCount = parseInt(htmlEl.getAttribute("data-css-loaded")) + 1;
        htmlEl.setAttribute("data-css-loaded", loadedCount);

        if (htmlEl.getAttribute("data-css") == loadedCount) {
            htmlEl.classList.add("css-preloaded");
        }
    }

    hold_event_listeners() {
        let store = {};

        function rewriteEvents(obj, evtName) {
            if (!store[obj]) {
                store[obj] = {
                    originalFunctions: {
                        add: obj.addEventListener,
                        remove: obj.removeEventListener
                    },
                    eventsToRewrite: []
                };
                obj.addEventListener = function() {
                    arguments[0] = transformEvent(arguments[0]);
                    store[obj].originalFunctions.add.apply(obj, arguments);
                };
                obj.removeEventListener = function() {
                    arguments[0] = transformEvent(arguments[0]);
                    store[obj].originalFunctions.remove.apply(obj, arguments);
                };
            }
            store[obj].eventsToRewrite.push(evtName);

            function transformEvent(e) {
                return store[obj].eventsToRewrite.indexOf(e) >= 0
                  ? "w3-" + e
                  : e;
            }
        }

        function rewriteProperties(obj, propName) {
            let originalVal = obj[propName];
            Object.defineProperty(obj, propName, {
                get: () => originalVal || function() {},
                set(value) {
                    obj["w3" + propName] = originalVal = value;
                }
            });
        }

        rewriteEvents(document, "DOMContentLoaded");
        rewriteEvents(window, "DOMContentLoaded");
        rewriteEvents(window, "load");
        rewriteEvents(window, "pageshow");
        rewriteEvents(document, "readystatechange");

        rewriteProperties(document, "onreadystatechange");
        rewriteProperties(window, "onload");
        rewriteProperties(window, "onpageshow");
    }

    hold_jquery(self) {
        let originaljQuery = window.jQuery;
        Object.defineProperty(window, "jQuery", {
            get: () => originaljQuery,
            set(newVal) {
                if (newVal && newVal.fn && !self.allJQueries.includes(newVal)) {
                    newVal.fn.ready = newVal.fn.init.prototype.ready = function(handler) {
                        if (handler !== undefined) {
                            if (self.scripts_load_fired) {
                                if (self.domReadyFired) {
                                    handler.bind(document)(newVal);
                                } else {
                                    document.addEventListener("w3-DOMContentLoaded", () => {
                                        handler.bind(document)(newVal);
                                    });
                                }
                            } else {
                                handler.bind(document)(newVal);
                            }
                        }
                        return newVal(document);
                    };
                    let originalOn = newVal.fn.on;
                    newVal.fn.on = newVal.fn.init.prototype.on = function() {
                        if (arguments[0] === "ready" && this[0] === document) {
                            arguments[1].bind(document)(newVal);
                        }
                        if (this[0] === window) {
                            function transformLoadEvents(evtNames) {
                                return evtNames.split(" ").map(evt =>
                                  (evt === "load" || evt.indexOf("load.") === 0)
                                    ? "w3-jquery-load"
                                    : evt
                                ).join(" ");
                            }
                            if (typeof arguments[0] === "string") {
                                arguments[0] = transformLoadEvents(arguments[0]);
                            } else if (typeof arguments[0] === "object") {
                                Object.keys(arguments[0]).forEach(k => {
                                    let val = arguments[0][k];
                                    delete arguments[0][k];
                                    arguments[0][transformLoadEvents(k)] = val;
                                });
                            }
                        }
                        return originalOn.apply(this, arguments);
                    };
                    self.allJQueries.push(newVal);
                }
                originaljQuery = newVal;
            }
        });
    }

    async execute_domcontentloaded() {
        this.domReadyFired = true;
        await this.repaint_frame();

        document.dispatchEvent(new Event("w3-DOMContentLoaded"));
        await this.repaint_frame();

        window.dispatchEvent(new Event("w3-DOMContentLoaded"));
        await this.repaint_frame();

        document.dispatchEvent(new Event("w3-readystatechange"));
        await this.repaint_frame();

        if (document.w3onreadystatechange) {
            document.w3onreadystatechange();
        }
    }

    async execute_window_load() {
        await this.repaint_frame();
        setTimeout(() => {
          window.dispatchEvent(new Event("w3-load"));
        }, 100);

        await this.repaint_frame();
        if (window.w3onload) {
            window.w3onload();
        }

        await this.repaint_frame();
        this.allJQueries.forEach(jq => {
            jq(window).trigger("w3-jquery-load");
        });

        window.dispatchEvent(new Event("w3-pageshow"));
        await this.repaint_frame();

        if (window.w3onpageshow) {
            window.w3onpageshow();
        }
    }

    exe_document_write() {
        let scriptMap = new Map();
        document.write = document.writeln = function(html) {
            let currentScript = document.currentScript,
                range = document.createRange(),
                parent = currentScript.parentElement,
                sibling = scriptMap.get(currentScript);

            if (sibling === undefined) {
                sibling = currentScript.nextSibling;
                scriptMap.set(currentScript, sibling);
            }
            let frag = document.createDocumentFragment();
            range.setStart(frag, 0);
            frag.appendChild(range.createContextualFragment(html));
            parent.insertBefore(frag, sibling);
        };
    }

    async repaint_frame() {
        return new Promise(resolve => requestAnimationFrame(resolve));
    }

    wnwAnalytics() {
        document.querySelectorAll(".analytics").forEach(function(el) {
            trekkie.integrations = false;
            var script = document.createElement("script");
            script.innerHTML = el.innerHTML;
            el.parentNode.insertBefore(script, el.nextSibling);
            el.parentNode.removeChild(el);
        });
    }


    wnwBoomerang() {
        document.querySelectorAll(".boomerang").forEach(function(el) {
            window.BOOMR.version = false;
            var script = document.createElement("script");
            script.innerHTML = el.innerHTML;
            el.parentNode.insertBefore(script, el.nextSibling);
            el.parentNode.removeChild(el);
        });
    }


    static execute() {
        let instance = new w3_loadscripts([
          "keydown",
          "mousemove",
          "touchmove",
          "touchstart",
          "touchend",
          "wheel"
        ]);
        instance.load_fonts(instance.w3_fonts);
        instance.user_events_add(instance);

        if (!instance.excluded_js) {
          instance.hold_jquery(instance);
        }
        if (!instance.w3_lazy_load_js) {
          instance.scripts_load_fire = 1;
          instance.triggerListener_on_load();
        }

        let i = setInterval(function checkScroll(inst) {
            if (document.body != null) {
                if (document.body.getBoundingClientRect().top < -30) {
                    inst.triggerListener();
                }
                clearInterval(i);
            }
        }, 500, instance);
    }
}

setTimeout(function(){
  w3_loadscripts.execute();
},1000);
</script>

<script>
(function(){
  var SELECTOR = [
    '.jdgm-widget a',
    '.jdgm-carousel-wrapper a',
    '.jdgm-revs-tab a'
  ].join(',');

  function neutralize(a) {
    a.setAttribute('href', 'javascript:void(0)');
    a.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
    a.style.cursor = 'default';
    a.setAttribute('tabindex', '-1');
    a.replaceWith(a.cloneNode(true));
  }

  document.querySelectorAll(SELECTOR).forEach(neutralize);

  document.body.addEventListener('click', function(e){
    if (e.target.closest(SELECTOR)) {
      e.preventDefault();
      e.stopImmediatePropagation();
      return false;
    }
  }, true);

  new MutationObserver(function(muts){
    muts.forEach(function(m){
      m.addedNodes.forEach(function(node){
        if (node.nodeType!==1) return;
        if (node.matches && node.matches(SELECTOR)) {
          neutralize(node);
        }
        node.querySelectorAll && node.querySelectorAll(SELECTOR).forEach(neutralize);
      });
    });
  }).observe(document.body,{
    childList: true,
    subtree: true
  });
})();
</script>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function(){
  var SEL = '.jdgm-carousel-item__product a';

  function neutralize() {
    document.querySelectorAll(SEL).forEach(function(a){
      if (a.getAttribute('href') !== 'javascript:void(0)') {
        a.setAttribute('href', 'javascript:void(0)');
        a.setAttribute('rel', 'nofollow noopener noreferrer');
        a.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
        a.style.cursor = 'default';
        a.setAttribute('tabindex', '-1');
      }
    });
  }

  neutralize();

  var interval = setInterval(neutralize, 500);

  setTimeout(function(){
    clearInterval(interval);
  }, 10_000);
});
</script>

<script type="module" defer="">
/* ---------- UTILS ---------- */
const throttle = (fn, wait = 100) => {
  let last = 0;
  return (...args) => {
    const now = Date.now();
    if (now - last >= wait) {
      last = now;
      fn(...args);
    }
  };
};

/* ---------- DOM READY ---------- */
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {



  /* 2. Visual focus (accessibility) */
  window.addEventListener('keydown', e => {
    if (e.key === 'Tab') document.body.classList.add('user-is-tabbing');
  }, { once: true, passive: true });

  /* 3. Tabelle scrollabili */
  const t = document.querySelector('.article table');
  if (t) {
    const w = document.createElement('div');
    w.style.overflowX = 'auto';
    t.before(w); w.appendChild(t);
  }

  /* 4. Animazioni (idle) */
  requestIdleCallback(() => {
    window.animate_content?.init?.();
  });

  /* 5. Accordion */
  document.querySelectorAll('.html-section-accordian-title')
    .forEach(el =>
      el.addEventListener('click', () =>
        el.nextElementSibling?.classList.toggle('open')
      )
    );

  /* 6. Sticky header / promo banner */
  const header = document.querySelector('.shopify-section--header .header');
  const promo  = document.querySelector('.promo-banner.js-promo_banner--global.sticky-promo--false');

  const onScroll = throttle(() => {
    const scrolled = window.scrollY >= 70;
    header?.classList.toggle('scroll', scrolled);
    promo ?.classList.toggle('scroll', scrolled);
  });

  window.addEventListener('scroll', onScroll, { passive: true });
  onScroll(); // inizializza

  /* 7. Ricerca */
  const searchToggle = document.getElementById('search-toggle');
  const searchBox    = document.getElementById('search');
  if (searchToggle && searchBox) {
    const input = searchBox.querySelector('input');
    const toggleSearch = () => {
      const visible = searchBox.classList.toggle('fadeIn');
      searchBox.hidden = !visible;
      header?.classList.toggle('header-background--true', visible);
      if (visible) {
        searchBox.style.paddingTop = `${(header?.offsetHeight ?? 0) + 50}px`;
        input?.focus();
      }
    };
    searchToggle.addEventListener('click', e => {
      e.preventDefault();
      toggleSearch();
    });
    document.addEventListener('click', e => {
      if (!e.target.closest('.search__form') && !searchBox.hidden) toggleSearch();
    });
  }

});
</script>
    



    <script defer="">
(() => {
  const LAZY_CLASS = 'LazyLoad';
  const OBS_ROOT_MARGIN = '200px';
  let webPSupported = false;

  // Detect WebP support
  (() => {
    const img = new Image();
    img.onload = () => webPSupported = img.width > 0 && img.height > 0;
    img.onerror = () => {};
    img.src = 'data:image/webp;base64,UklGRiIAAABXRUJQVlA4TAYAAAAvAAAAAAfQ//73v/+BiOh/AAA=';
  })();

  // IntersectionObserver callback
  const onIntersect = (entries, observer) => {
    entries.forEach(({ target: el, isIntersecting }) => {
      if (!isIntersecting) return;

      // Background elements
      if (el.matches('div:not(.w3_js), section:not(.w3_js)')) {
        el.classList.add('w3_bg');
        observer.unobserve(el);
        return;
      }

      // Iframe placeholders
      if (el.tagName === 'IFRAMELAZY') {
        const iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
        [...el.attributes].forEach(attr => iframe.setAttribute(attr.name, attr.value));
        el.replaceWith(iframe);
        observer.unobserve(el);
        return;
      }

      // Images and media
      const src = el.dataset.src || el.src;
      const srcset = el.dataset.srcset || el.srcset;
      if (src) el.src = src;
      if (srcset) el.srcset = srcset;

      el.removeAttribute('data-class');
      observer.unobserve(el);
    });
  };

  // Create observer
  const observer = new IntersectionObserver(onIntersect, {
    rootMargin: OBS_ROOT_MARGIN,
    threshold: 0.01
  });

  // Observe on load
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    document.querySelectorAll(`img[data-class="${LAZY_CLASS}"], iframelazy[data-class="${LAZY_CLASS}"]`)
      .forEach(el => observer.observe(el));

    document.querySelectorAll('div:not(.w3_js), section:not(.w3_js)')
      .forEach(el => observer.observe(el));

    document.querySelectorAll('videolazy')
      .forEach(el => {
        const video = document.createElement('video');
        [...el.attributes].forEach(attr => video.setAttribute(attr.name, attr.value));
        video.innerHTML = el.innerHTML;
        el.replaceWith(video);
      });
  });
})();
</script>
